i am colorblind.
i am a nurse at a hospital.

participant_2.background:
I go for a walk with my dogs every day.
I'm a bit of a klutz, but I always try to be careful around my pets.
I am not very fashionable but I do like to wear nice clothes on special occasions.
I've been working at my current job for three years, and I'm really happy here.
My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Nothing much, just got back from a walk with my dogs.
Oh, I love dogs! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a poodle.
Aww, that's so cute! I've always wanted a golden retriever.
They're the best dogs! They're so friendly and loving.
I know, right? I love how they're always happy to see you.
Me too! They're the best companions.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer at a tech company.
Oh, cool! I'm a nurse at a hospital.
Wow, that's really important work!
Thanks! It can be challenging, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you're happy with your job.
Thanks! I am. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks with my dogs, read books, and watch movies.
Oh, I love reading books too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different genres, but I'm really into historical fiction right now.
That's a great genre! I love historical fiction too.
Me too! It's so interesting to learn about different time periods.
I know, right? It's like traveling back in time.
Yeah, it's the best
